st: Kya Khoob Zamaane Ki Wafa Dekhte Rahe
s:
Kya Khoob Zamaane Ki Wafa Dekhte Rahe
Har Baat Me Hum Apni Khata Dekhte Rahe

Yu To Zamaane Ne Badle Bahut Rang
Par Hum To Uski Zafa Dekhte Rahe

Mushkilo Me Thi Zindagi Hamari
Hum To Bas Halaato Ka Maza Dekhte Rahe

Apne Kehne Ko To Bahut Mile
Par Hum Uska Ehsas Dekhte Rahe

Yu To Chahat Ka Samundar Tha Hamare Paas
Hum To Kisi Ke Milne Ki Aans Dekhte Rahe…

st: Woh Itne Hasee Honge Eh Mere Dosto,
s:
Woh Itne Hasee Honge Eh Mere Dosto,
Dil Ko Is Baat Ka Yakee Aata Nahi,

Ab Toh Unko Paane Ki Chahat Ho Gayi,
Unke Bina Ab Kuchh Bhata Nahi…

st: Jab Dekhi Tumhari Muskurahat,
s:
Jab Dekhi Tumhari Muskurahat,
Mere Dill Ko Mili Rahat,

Sochte Hain, Kya Yahi Hai Chahat,
Haai, Yeh Kaisi Machi Hai Dill Mein Kayamat…

st: Aapko Apne Jakham Dikhana Chahta Hu Main,
s:
Aapko Apne Jakham Dikhana Chahta Hu Main,
Magar Kya Karun Bahut Hi Door Hain Aap,

Aapko Chahta Hu Banana Sathi Apna,
Magar Maanta Hu, Rashmo Ke Haatho Majbur Hain Aap…

st: uski chahat ki chandani hogi
s:
uski chahat ki chandani hogi
khoob surat si zindagi hogi

el ladki bahut se phool liye
dil ki dahlij par khadi hogi

chahe jitne chirag gull kar do
is nagar mein toh roshni hogi

neend tarsegi meri aankhon ko
jab bhi khwabo se dosti hogi

hum bahut door the magar tumne
dil ki aawaj toh suni hogi

sochta hu ke woh kahan hoga
kiske aangan mein chandani hogi…

st: Jitna Chahte Hain Tumko
s:
Jitna Chahte Hain Tumko
Kash Chahti Utna Tum Mujh Ko
Agar Tum Mill Jati Mujh Ko
To Dunya Ki Har Khushi Mill Jati Tujh Ko..!!!

st: Zindagi Kitni Khubsurat Hoti
s:
Zindagi Kitni Khubsurat Hoti
Agr Teri Chahat Adhori Naa Hoti
Kuch Uljane Khuch Majburiyan Hoti Beshak
Mgr Pyar Mein Itni Dooriyan Na Hoti..!!!

st: Ye Chandni Bhi Ab Sooni Sooni Hai
s:
Ye Chandni Bhi Ab Sooni Sooni Hai
Muat Ki Chahat Ab Tak Adhoori Hai
Ye Kaisi Tujh Se Meri Doori Hai
Jeena Tu Bas Ab Aik Majboori Hai

st: Aik Din Jab Meri Sans Band Ho Jayegi
s:
Aik Din Jab Meri Sans Band Ho Jayegi
Mat Sochna Ki Chahat Kam Ho Jayegi
Fark Sirf Itna Hoga
Aaj Hum Apko Yaad Karte Hain
Kal Meri Yaad Apko Rulaygi…

st: Aj Phir Aaina Pochhta Hai
s:
Aj Phir Aaina Pochhta Hai
Ke Teri Aankhoon Mein Nami Kiyun Hai
Jiski Chahat Mein Khud Ko Bhula Diya
Phir Uski Chahat Mein Kami Kiyun Hai…

st: Zaroorat Hai Mujhe Tere Pyar Ki
s:
Zaroorat Hai Mujhe Tere Pyar Ki
Chahat Hy Mujhe Tere Ikrar Ki
Jante Hain Hum Tumko Is Kadar
Gunjaish Hi Nhi Kisi Takrar Ki

st: Aap Se Milne Ki Chahat Hamesha Rahegi
s:
Aap Se Milne Ki Chahat Hamesha Rahegi
Apko Bhoolkar Yeh Zindagi Na Rahegi
Apse Humari Dosti Tub Tak Rahegi
Jab Tak Ye Dunya Salamut Rahegi…

st: Kitna Chahta Hoon Tujhe Ye Mujhko Pata Nahi
s:
Kitna Chahta Hoon Tujhe Ye Mujhko Pata Nahi
Mgr Tumhare Siwa Koi Or Dil Mein Basa Nahi,
Zamana Dushman Ho Giya Chahat Ka Humari,
Juda Ho Gye Phir Sy Hum Ye Meri Khata Nahi….

st: Bin Uske Zindagi Mein Koi Khushi Nahi,
s:
Bin Uske Zindagi Mein Koi Khushi Nahi,
Woh Naraz Hy Mujhse Tu Labon Pe Mere Hansi Nhi,
Na Samjhe Woh Agar Tu Hum Kiya Karein,
Iss Dil Mein Uske Siwa Kisi Aur Ki Jagah Bhi Tu Nhi….

st: Jisne Toot Kar Chaha
s:
Jisne Toot Kar Chaha
Wohi Toh Tha Meharban Mera,
Kawboon Ki Adla Badli Mein,
Jal Giya Th Ashiyan Mera,
Husan Ka Jalwa Bina Dekhe,
Kho Giya Tha Dilruba Mera,
Koul Se Hatne Ki Saajis Mein,
Usne Pakda Girebaa Mera,
Kaliyan Chahat Ki Masal Dilayi,
Fir Bhi Tha Woh Baghbaan Mera…

st: Main Chahta Hoon Yeh Duniya Woh Chahta Hai Mujhe
s:
Main Chahta Hoon Yeh Duniya Woh Chahta Hai Mujhe
Yeh Samasya Badi Najuk Hai Koi Hal Likh De,
Yeh Aj Jiska Hy Us Naam Ko Mubarak Ho,
Mari Zubaan Pr Mere Aansoo Se Kal Likh De,
Mein Aik Lamhein Mein Dunya Samet Sakta Hoon,
To Kb Milega Akele Main Wo Aik Pal Likh De,
Meri Zuban Pr Naye Jayko Ke Fal Likh De,
Mere Khuda Tu Mere Naam Aik Gajal Likh De…

st: Apko Apne Zakham Dekhna Chahta Hoon Mein
s:
Apko Apne Zakham Dekhna Chahta Hoon Mein
Magar Kiya Karun Bahoot Hi Door Hain Ap,
Apko Chahta Hoon Banana Sathi Apna,
Mgr Manta Hoon, Rashmo Ke Haathoon Majboor Hain Ap…

st: Dil k jazbon ko sanbhal k rakho sada
s:
Dil k jazbon ko sanbhal k rakho sada
ye mooti wafa k, inhen rola nahi kerty
chahat k dareechy bohat anmool hoty hain
har kisi k liye in dareechon ko khola nahi kerty

st: Talaash Karo Koi Tumhe Mil Jayega,
s:
Talaash Karo Koi Tumhe Mil Jayega,
Magar Hamari Tarha Tumhe Kaun Chahega,
Zarur Koi Chahat Ki Nazar Se Tumhe Dekhega,
Magar Ankhein Hamari Kahan Se Layega…

st: Ek Din Jab Meri Sans Band Ho Jayegi
s:
Ek Din Jab Meri Sans Band Ho Jayegi
Mat Sochna Ki Chahat Kam Ho Jayegi
Fark Sirf Itna Hoga
Aaj Hum Aapko Yaad Karte Hain
Kal Meri Yaad Aapko Rulayegi…

st: Chahat Se Teri Ankho Mein Dube, Nafrat Se Aansu Bankar Uchle
s:
Chahat Se Teri Ankho Mein Dube, Nafrat Se Aansu Bankar Uchle
Gire Jo Farsh Pe Toote Aise, Rehza Rehza Dil Bikhra Jaise
Umeed-E-Wafa Kare Kaise, Zubaan-E-Haal Kahe Kis Se
Salaam-E-Dil-E-Muztar, Khamosh Mohabbat Mein Hai Intezar
 
Barish Jab Bhi Uski Chahat Ko Bhigoti Hogi.

st: Peshaniyon pe likhe muqaddar nahi mile
s:
Peshaniyon pe likhe muqaddar nahi mile
dastar kahan milenge jahan sar nahi mile
aavaragi ko dubate suraj se rabt hai
magrib ke bad hum bhi to ghar par nahi mile
kal aainon ka jashn hua tha tamam raat
andhe tamashbinon ko pathar nahi mile
main chahata tha khud se mulaqat ho magar
aaine mere qad ke barabar nahi mile
pardes ja rahe ho to sab dekhte chalo
mumkin hai vapas aao to ye ghar nahi mile

st: khwab ke tarah bikhar jane ko jee chahata hai
s:
khwab ke tarah bikhar jane ko jee chahata hai
aisi tanhai ki mar jane ko jee chahata hai
ghar ke vahshat se larazata hun magar jane kyon
sham hoti hai to ghar jane ko jee chahata hai
dub jaun to koi mauj nishan tak na bataye
aisi nadi mein utar jane ko jee chahata hai
kabhi mil jaye to raste ke thakan jag pade
aisi manzil se guzar jane ko jee chahata hai
wohi paiman jo kabhi jee ko khush aaya tha bahut
usi paiman se mukar jane ko jee chahata hai

st: madine ko jayen jee chahata hai
s:
madine ko jayen jee chahata hai
muqaddar banayen jee chahata hai
madine ke aaka do aalam ke maula
tere pas aayen jee chahata hai
jahan donon aalam hain mahar-e-tamanna
vahan sar jhukayen jee chahata hai
muhammad ke baten muhammed ke sirat
sune aur sunayen jee chahata hai

st: jis tarah ke hain ye divaren ye dar jaisa bhi hai
s:
jis tarah ke hain ye divaren ye dar jaisa bhi hai
sar chipane ko mayassar to hai ghar jaisa bhi hai
us ko mujh se mujh ko us se nisbaten hain beshumar
meri chahat ka hai mahavar ye nagar jaisa bhi hai
chal pada hun shauq-e-beparvah ko murshad man kar
rasta purpech hai ya purkhatar jaisa bhi hai
sab gavara hai thakan sari dukhan sari chubhan
ek khushbu ke liye hai ye safar jaisa bhi hai
wo to hai makhsus ik teri mohabbat ke liye
tera ‘anwar’ bahunar ya behunar jaisa bhi hai

st: jivan kya hai chalata phirta ek khilona hai
s:
jivan kya hai chalata phirta ek khilona hai
do aankhon mein ek se hansana ek se rona hai
jo jee chahe wo mil jaye kab aisa hota hai
har jivan jivan jine ka samajhauta hai
ab tak jo hota aaya hai wo hi hona hai
raat andheri bhor suhani yahi zamana hai
har chadar mein dukh ka tana sukha ka bana hai
aati sans ko pana jati sans ko khona hai

st: chandani ko rusul kehta hun
s:
chandani ko rusul kehta hun
bat ko bausul kehta hun
jagamagate hue sitaron ko
tere pairon ke dhul kehta hun
jo chaman ke hayat ko das le
us kali ko babul kehta hun
ittefaqan tumhare milane ko
zindagi ka husul kehta hun
aap ke sanvali si surat ko
zauq-e-yazdan ke bhool kehta hun
jab mayassar ho sagar-o-mina
barqparon ko phul kehta hun

st: chand sitaron se kya puchun kab din mere phirate hain
s:
chand sitaron se kya puchun kab din mere phirate hain
wo to bechare khud hain bhikari dere dere phirate hain
jin galiyon mai hum ne sukh ke sej pe raten kati thin
un galiyon mai vyakul hokar sanjh savere phirate hain
rup-sarup ke jot jagana is nagari mai jokhim hai
charon khunt bagule ban kar ghor andhere phirate hain
jin ke sham-badan saye mai mera man sustaya tha
ab tak aankhon ke aage wo bal ghanere phirate hain
koi hamen bhi ye samajha do un par dil kyon rijh gaya
tikhi chitavan banki chab vale bahutere phirate hain
is nagari mai bag aur ban ke yaro lila nyari hai
panchi apne sar pe uthakar apne basere phirate hain
log to daman si lete hain jaise ho jee lete hain
‘abid’ hum divane hain jo bal bikhere phirate hain

st: chand se phul se ya meri zuban se suniye
s:
chand se phul se ya meri zuban se suniye
har taraf aap ka qisa jahan se suniye
sab ko aata hai duniya ko sata kar jina
zindagi kya muhabbat ke dua se suniye
meri aavaz parda mere chehare ka
main hun khamosh jahan mujhako vahan se suniye
kya zaruri hai ki har parda uthaya jaye
mere halat apne apne makan se suniye

st: chahat ka ek mitha mitha dard jagane sham dhale
s:
chahat ka ek mitha mitha dard jagane sham dhale
teri yaden aa jati hain mujhako rulane sham dhale
teri zulfen in kandhon par tera chehara hathon mein
main ne bhi dekhe hain kitane khvab suhane sham dhale
har din hum se wada karake yun hi agar tadapaoge
ik din yun hi ho jayenge hum bhi divane sham dhale
din ke ujale mein to mana lun lakh yatan se bahala lun
lekin dil ka pagal panchi ek na mane sham dhale

st: Chahat Ki Raah Me Bhikre Armaan Bhut Hai
s:
Chahat Ki Raah Me Bhikre Armaan Bhut Hai
Hum Uski Yaad Me Pareshan Bhut Hai
Woh Har Baar Dil Todta Hai Ye Kah Kr
Meri Ummedon K Duniya Me Abi Mukaam Bahut Ha

st: Pagal Huye Jo Hum To Ulfat Usy B Thi
s:
Pagal Huye Jo Hum To Ulfat Usy B Thi
Chaha Jo Hm Ne Us Ko To Chahat Usay B Thi
Usko Na Bhol Payengay Wo Janta Tha
Or Har Baat Bhol Jane Ki Adat Usay B Thi.

st: Pyaar Ka Badla Kabhi Chuka Na Sakenge
s:
Pyaar Ka Badla Kabhi Chuka Na Sakenge
Chaah K Bhi Aapko Bhula Na Sakenge
Aap Hi Ho Mere Labo Ki Hasi
Aap Se Bicchade To Kabhi Muskuraa Na Sakenge

st: Itni Chahat Ki Us Se K Intha Ho Gae,
s:
Itni Chahat Ki Us Se K Intha Ho Gae,
Wo Mohabt Kar K Phir Bewfa Ho Gae,
Main To Bus Chahta Raha Toot Kar Usay,
Bus Yahi To 1 Muj Se Khta Ho Gae..

st: Ek Shaks Pas Reh Ke Samjha Nhi Mujhe
s:
Ek Shaks Pas Reh Ke Samjha Nhi Mujhe
Is Baat Ka Malal Hai Shikwa Nahi Mujhe
Main Us Ko Bewafai Ka Ilzam Kaise Du
Usne To Dil Se Hi Chaha Nahi Mujhe

st: Is Raaz-E-Mohabbat Ko Aam Nahin Karna,
s:
Is Raaz-E-Mohabbat Ko Aam Nahin Karna,
Chahat Ke Jazboon Ko Badnaam Nahin Karna,
Tum Jaan Ho Hamari Bas Itna Samajh Lo,
Mere In Lafzoon Ko Neelam Nahin Karna

st: Tera Na Milna Mera Naseeb Hi Sahi Lekin,
s:
Tera Na Milna Mera Naseeb Hi Sahi Lekin,
Ae Sanam
Meri Qismat Mein Likha Hai Tujhe Toot Ke Chahna

st: Chahat Ki Raah Me Bhikre Armaan Bhut Hai
s:
Chahat Ki Raah Me Bhikre Armaan Bhut Hai
Hum Uski Yaad Me Pareshan Bhut Hai
Woh Har Baar Dil Todta Hai Ye Kah Kr
Meri Ummedon K Duniya Me Abi Mukaam Bahut Hai…

st: Aaj To Teri Yaad K Jhonka Tak Nai Aaya,
s:
Aaj To Teri Yaad K Jhonka Tak Nai Aaya,
Aaj Jane Q Chahtoun Pe Zawal Aaya Hai.

st: Maine Kabhi Ek Chand Ko Pana Chaha Tha
s:
Maine Kabhi Ek Chand Ko Pana Chaha Tha
Us Dur Akash Ke Ek Sitare Ko Gale Lagana Chaha Tha
In Namumkin Si Chizo Ko Main Mumkin Banane Chala Tha
Jane Kyu Us Din Main Kisi Se Dil Lagane Ko Chala Tha

st: Hum To Moujood Thy Andheron Main Ujalon Ki Tarha
s:
Hum To Moujood Thy Andheron Main Ujalon Ki Tarha
Tum Ne Chaha Hi Nahi Chahny Walon Ki Tarha

st: Kisi Ko Chaho To Is Aandaz Se Chaho
s:
Kisi Ko Chaho To Is Aandaz Se Chaho
K Uss Ko Jab Bhi Pyaar Mile To Tum Yaad Aa Jao…!!

st: Paani Se Tasvir Kahan Banti Hai,
s:
Paani Se Tasvir Kahan Banti Hai,
Khwabo Se Takdir Kahan Banti Hai,
Kisi Ko Chaho To Sacche Dil Se,
Knunki Yeh Zindagi Phir Kahan Milti Ha

st: Ek Alag Sa Shayar Mujhme Jagaya Hai,
s:
Ek Alag Sa Shayar Mujhme Jagaya Hai,
Mujhe Iskadar Deewana Banaya Hai
Pal Pal Tujhko Paas Main Pati Hun,
Ek Nazam Udher En Kalam Ka Ubaal Aaya Hai

st: Kash Usey Chahne Ka Arman Na Hota
s:
Kash Usey Chahne Ka Arman Na Hota
Main Hosh Mein Rehtey Howay Anjan Na Hota
Na PYAR Hota Kisi Pther DIL Se Hum Ko
Yaa Koi Pathr DIL Insaan Na Hota

st: Teri Chahat Ke Ik Ik Pal
s:
Teri Chahat Ke Ik Ik Pal
Mere Lahoo Mein Utartey Rahe
Sansoon Ne Ro Ro Ke Mangi Hai Rab Se Doua
Mar Ke Be Tum Pe Martey Rahe
Sanoon Ne Sansoon Par Likh Di Jo Dastan
Hum Wo Dastaan Apni Rooh Se Kehtey Rahe!!

st: Poojta Hun Tumhe Apne Bhagwan Se Jyada
s:
Poojta Hun Tumhe Apne Bhagwan Se Jyada
Mantaa Hun Tumhe Apne Imaan Se Jyada
Kartaa Hun Tumhari Izzat Apni Aan Se Jyada
Chahta Hun Tumhe Apni Jaan Se Jyada

st: Zindagi Ek Chahat Ka Silsila Hai,
s:
Zindagi Ek Chahat Ka Silsila Hai,
Koi Mil Gaya To Koi Bichad Gaya,
Jinhe Manga Tha Duao Mein,
Voh Kisi Ko Bina Maange Mil Gaya.
Ankhon Ki Zuban Woh Samajh Nahi Pate,
Hooton Se Hum Bhi Kuch Keh Nahi Pate,
Apni Bebasi Hum Kis Tarah Kahe,
Koi Hai Jiske Bina Hum Reh Nahi Pate.

st: Main Ne Chaha Tere Janam Din Par
s:
Main Ne Chaha Tere Janam Din Par
Aisa Tohfa Teri Nazar Karoon
Jise Tu Mudaton Yaad Rakhe
Phir Ik Lamhe Ki Soch Ne
Mere Haath Buland Kiye Or Kuch Duaaon Ki Punchhi
Dil Se Azad Kiye Ki Aane Wale Mausmon Mein
Ghum Ki Ghataen Kabhi Tere Qareeb Na Aayen
Teri Aankhon Ke Jugnu Sada Chamkaen

st: Jisne Humko Chaha, Use Hum Chah Na Sake,
s:
Jisne Humko Chaha, Use Hum Chah Na Sake,
Jisko Chaha Usae Hum Pa Na Sake,
Yeh Samajh Lo Dil Tutne Ka Khel Hai,
Kisi Ka Toda Aur Apna Bacha Na Sake

st: Apne Aagaaz Se Aaj Tak Zindagi
s:
Apne Aagaaz Se Aaj Tak Zindagi
Teri He Yaad Main Goom Rahi Thi
Phir Bhi Jaane Kyon Yeh Ehsaas Hai
Jaise Chaahat Meri Kam Rahi

st: Wo Mulakaat Kuch Adhuri Si Lagi
s:
Wo Mulakaat Kuch Adhuri Si Lagi
Paas Hokar Bhi Kuch Doori Si Lagi
Hotho Pe Hassi Aankhon Me Nami,
Pehli Baar Kisi Ki Chahat Itni Jaruri Si Lagi

st: Chahte Hai Unke Daman Me Khushiya Bhar De
s:
Chahte Hai Unke Daman Me Khushiya Bhar De
Unki Khushiyo Me Apni Jan Fana Kar De
Kabhi Wo Jo Ghabraye Tanhaiyo Me Apni
Ham Apni Chahto Se Use Shamil-A-Mahfil Kar De

st: Main Chahun Sapnon Mein Bhi Sath Uska Ho,
s:
Main Chahun Sapnon Mein Bhi Sath Uska Ho,
In Hathon Mei Mere Bs Hath Uska Ho,
Chahat Mjhy Itni Hai Us Sy K,
Dil Manta Nhi Koi Mere Baad Uska Ho.

st: Apko Chahne Wale Kam Na Honge
s:
Apko Chahne Wale Kam Na Honge
Waqt Ke Sath Shayd Hum Na Honge
Ap Kisi Ko Kitna B Pyar Kar Lena
Par Yado Ke Asli Haqdar Sirf Hum Hi Honge

st: Yeh Dil Tha Bekarar Tujh pe
s:
Yeh Dil Tha Bekarar Tujh pe
Thi Chahat Mujhe Beshumar Tujh se

Phir Yeh Kya Kiya Tune Dil Badal Sa Gaya
Kyon Ho Gaya Yeh Dil Ab Bezaar Tujh se

st: Tamam Gham Bhool Janey Ko G Karta Hai Aaj
s:
Tamam Gham Bhool Janey Ko G Karta Hai Aaj
Aksar Muskuranay Ko G Karta Hai
Bohut G Liiye Sahare Aap Ki Yadoon K
Aaj Aap K Paas Aaney Ko G Karta Hai

st: Zindagi Younhi Teri Chahat K Naam Kardi
s:
Zindagi Younhi Teri Chahat K Naam Kardi
Jaisay Ghanay Darakht K Neeche Sham Kardi
Laut Jate Hain Parinde Shaam Hote Hi
Hamne To Har Shaam Hi Tere Naam Kardi

st: Meri Chahat Ka Hisab Jo Lagao Gay
s:
Meri Chahat Ka Hisab Jo Lagao Gay
To Meri Chahat Ko Bayhisab Pao Gay
Meri Chahat Hay Pani K Bulbulay Jesi
Zara Sa Thukrao Gy To Dhondtay Reh Jao Ge

st: Hum To Mojod Thy Raaton Me Ujalon Ki Tarah
s:
Hum To Mojod Thy Raaton Me Ujalon Ki Tarah
Log Nikly Hi Nahi Dhondne Walon Ki Tarah
Dil To Kia Hum Rooh Me Uter Jate
Us Ne Chaha Hi Nahi Chahne Walon Ki Tarah

st: Unki Nafrat Ko Hum Chahat Samaj Baithe
s:
Unki Nafrat Ko Hum Chahat Samaj Baithe
Usne Toda Jo Mera Khwab To Uski Ghabrahat Samaj Baithe
Dilo Se Khelna To Fitrat Thi Uski
Uske Is Sauk Ko Hum Mohabbat Ki Aahat Samaj Baithe

st: Pyaar Ka Badla Kabhi Chuka Na Sakenge
s:
Pyaar Ka Badla Kabhi Chuka Na Sakenge
Chaah K Bhi Aapko Bhula Na Sakenge
Aap Hi Ho Mere Labo Ki Hasi
Aap Se Bicchade To Kabhi Muskuraa Na Sakenge

st: Pagal Huye Jo Hum To Ulfat Usy B Thi
s:
Pagal Huye Jo Hum To Ulfat Usy B Thi
Chaha Jo Hm Ne Us Ko To Chahat Usay B Thi
Usko Na Bhol Payengay Wo Janta Tha
Or Har Baat Bhol Jane Ki Adat Usay B Thi.

st: Talaash Karo Koi Tumhe Mil Jayega,
s:
Talaash Karo Koi Tumhe Mil Jayega,
Magar Hamari Tarha Tumhe Kaun Chahega,
Zarur Koi Chahat Ki Nazar Se Tumhe Dekhega,
Magar Ankhein Hamari Kahan Se Layega..
